EMAIL_INVALID: Email must be a valid email address.
NATIONAL_ID_STRING: National ID must be a string.
UNIVERSITY_ID_STRING: University ID must be a string.
PHONE_INVALID: Phone must be a valid phone number.
UUID: Value must be a valid UUID.
MIN: Value is below the minimum allowed.
NESTED: Value must be a valid object.
NAME_EN_STRING: English name must be a string.
NAME_AR_STRING: Arabic name must be a string.
NAME_OBJECT: Name must be a valid object.
OLD_PASSWORD_STRING: Old password must be a string.
NEW_PASSWORD_STRING: New password must be a string.
CODE_STRING: Course code must be a string.
LECTURE_HOURS_INTEGER: Lecture hours must be an integer.
PRACTICAL_HOURS_INTEGER: Practical hours must be an integer.
CREDIT_HOURS_INTEGER: Credit hours must be an integer.
